body_html:
Hello, also need this op for CPU, vital to my project to run on mobile.
@shadySource , when I apply your workaround and try to retrain the model, the training seems to be launched on my CPU instead of my GPU and fails (the GPU device for training is not created, as it is with the original code, and the process eventually kills itself).
body_text:
Hello, also need this op for CPU, vital to my project to run on mobile.
@shadySource , when I apply your workaround and try to retrain the model, the training seems to be launched on my CPU instead of my GPU and fails (the GPU device for training is not created, as it is with the original code, and the process eventually kills itself).
body:
Hello, also need this op for CPU, vital to my project to run on mobile.
@shadySource , when I apply your workaround and try to retrain the model, the training seems to be launched on my CPU instead of my GPU and fails (the GPU device for training is not created, as it is with the original code, and the process eventually kills itself).
